alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Eastern Union; Hudson (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 01 at 4:39PM EST until January 02 at 9:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southern Queens and Southern Nassau Counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 9 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. KILL VAN KULL AT BERGEN POINT NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.2 FT, MODERATE 8.5 FT, MAJOR 9.6 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 3.0 FT, MAJOR 4.1 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 02/08 AM 7.3/ 7.8 1.8/ 2.2 1.0/ 1.5 0 MINOR 02/07 PM 5.9/ 6.4 0.4/ 0.9 1.1/ 1.6 0-1 NONE 03/08 AM 6.8/ 7.3 1.3/ 1.8 0.4/ 0.9 1 NONE 03/09 PM 5.7/ 6.2 0.2/ 0.7 0.6/ 1.1 0-1 NONE NEW YORK HARBOR AT THE BATTERY NY MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
